TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MyGroupCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MyGroupCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MyGroupCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: This attribute supports and in Visual Basic.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This attribute supports `My.Forms` and `My.WebServices` in Visual Basic. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.
When this attribute is put on a class, the compiler fills that class with properties corresponding to all the types in the project that derive from the type specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MyGroupCollectionAttribute.MyGroupName%2A> property.

Docs.param: . Initializes the property. The compiler generates accessor properties for classes that derive from this type.
. Initializes the property. Specifies the method in the class that creates the type's instances.
. Initializes the property. Specifies the method in the class that disposes of the type's instances.
. Initializes the property. Specifies the name of the property that returns the default instance of the class.
